oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Relativistic mean field approach and the pseudospin symmetry
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: LALAZISSIS, GA
GAMBHIR, YK
MAHARANA, JP
WARKE, CS
RING, P
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: finite nuclei
transformation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Based on the relativistic mean field (RMF) approach the existence of the broken pseudospin symmetry is investigated. Both spherical RMF and constrained deformed RMF calculations are carried out employing realistic Lagrangian parameters for spherical and for deformed sample nuclei. The quasidegenerate pseudospin doublets are confirmed to exist near the Fermi surface for both spherical and deformed nuclei.
